      • checkAuthorizations

        @POST(value="/datastore/authorizations")
java.lang.Iterable<Authorization> checkAuthorizations(@Body
                                                                                               java.util.Set<AccessCheck> queries)

      • getAccessibleObjects

        @GET(value="/datastore/authorizations")
AuthorizedObjectsSearchResult getAccessibleObjects(@Query(value="objectType")
                                                                                           SecurableObjectType objectType,
                                                                                           @Query(value="permission")
                                                                                           Permission permission,
                                                                                           @Query(value="pagingToken")
                                                                                           java.lang.String pagingToken)
        Returns paged results for all authorized objects of specified objectType, that the current user has specified permission for.
        Parameters:
        objectType - Required field. Specifying the Securable Object Type that user wants to search for.
        permission - Required field. Specifying the permission the user must have for the accessible objects.
        pagingToken - Unrequired field. One may use the paging token from previous search result to get to the next page of results.
        Returns:
